entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
